value:
Matthew's more of a master thief
than I am. But I'll do what I can.

Treading lightly is nothing new to me.
For a spy, it's second nature.

Lord Hector is the sort of eccentric
who'd enjoy a festival like this.

What do you think? Does the mask
complete the illusion?

The outfit's functional enough, but
you'd think the last thing a thief
would want is to stand out.

I have a secure message to deliver to
$Nu, entrusted to
me by $Nf.

Once I get eyes on the valuables,
they're as good as mine.
Can't afford to get careless.
I must have made a mistake...

I'll help myself to whatever isn't
nailed down.

I'm Leila. Are you looking for a thief?
Count me in.

So, what do you think? Do I look the
part, $Nu?$k$pSpying and thieving have a lot in
common. I'm used to the former,
so the latter comes easily.$k$pOf course, spies are interested in
acquiring information, not material
goods. But the skills translate.$k$pI enjoy a straightforward stealth
mission. Get to the objective, keep
out of sight. Simple as that.$k$pSo feel free to give me as much of
this work as you've got.$k$pTrust me, the risk of losing my life is
nothing at all in comparison to what
I'm used to.
That's as good as mine.
Show me your valuables.
My first target…
Here I am.
Matthew...I'm sorry...
The most masterful skill in thievery is to do the work without being detected.
*startled noise* If just anyone can sneak up on me, I'm not half the thief I thought I was.
My skills as a spy will help me steal with panache.
What do I want? That's a good question. Perhaps a peaceful life with Matthew... Silly, I know.
I can't decide if it's riskier to live as a spy or a thief.
All it took to shake you from my tail was putting on a mask… Hah. Talk to me again when you're more astute.
I'll steal whatever you desire.
Your decision?
Hmm...
On the job.
